item.title: Holly add a quote by Andrew Vachss
item.description: "Cats are the lap-dancers of the animal world. Soon as you stop shelling out, they move on, find another lap. They're furry little sociopaths. Pretty and slick -- in love with themselves. When's the last time you saw a seeing-eye cat?" -- Andrew Vachss

item.title: Holly add a quote by Andrew Vachss
item.description: "It's the family you choose that counts." -- Andrew Vachss

item.title: Holly add a quote by Andrew Vachss
item.description: "In my world, people are <I>always</I> plotting. You have no idea of all the <I>crimes</I> people in business commit every day. Like it was nothing. Or there’s a set of special rules for them. Remember when Bush made that whole speech about ‘corporate ethics’ last year? What a fraud. You think stuff like Enron or WorldCom is an aberration? It’s only the tip. Business is a religion. Probably the only one practiced all over the world." -- Andrew Vachss
